Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.motion

Interface MotionModifier

All Superinterfaces:
DirectionProvider, SpeedProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
AABBCollided, AABBSideAwareCollided, BufferedMoveable, MotionApplier, Moveable, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMotionApplier, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity
public interface MotionModifier
extends SpeedProvider, DirectionProvider
A MotionModifier is capable of modifying a motion.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void alterSpeedBy​(double increment)
    Alter the speed through addition.
    void changeDirectionBy​(double rotation)
    Change the direction by adding a rotation in degrees.
    void multiplySpeedWith​(double multiplication)
    Alter the speed through multiplication.
    void setDirectionTo​(double direction)
    Set the Direction.
    void setMotionTo​(double speed, double direction)
    Set the motion.
    void setSpeedTo​(double speed)
    Set the speed.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.motion.DirectionProvider

    getDirection

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.motion.SpeedProvider

    getSpeed

  • Method Details

    • setMotionTo

      void setMotionTo​(double speed, double direction)
      Set the motion.
      Parameters:
      speed - the speed as a double
      direction - the direction in degrees as a double

    • multiplySpeedWith

      void multiplySpeedWith​(double multiplication)
      Alter the speed through multiplication. Using this method will increase or decrease the current speed. It will multiply the current speed by the provided value.

      If it is required to set the speed to a specific value, use the method setSpeedTo(double)}.

      Parameters:
      multiplication - A value greater than 1 will mean an increment in speed. A value between 0 and 1 will mean a decrement in speed

    • alterSpeedBy

      void alterSpeedBy​(double increment)
      Alter the speed through addition. Using this method will increase or decrease the current speed. It will add the provided value to the current speed. Use a negative value to decrease the speed.
      Parameters:
      increment - A value greater than 1 will mean an increment in speed. A value between 0 and 1 will mean a decrement in speed.

    • setSpeedTo

      void setSpeedTo​(double speed)
      Set the speed.
      Parameters:
      speed - the speed as a double

    • setDirectionTo

      void setDirectionTo​(double direction)
      Set the Direction. This value is in degrees, where
      • 0 means up
      • 90 means to the right
      • 180 means down
      • 270 to the left
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction in degrees as a double

    • changeDirectionBy

      void changeDirectionBy​(double rotation)
      Change the direction by adding a rotation in degrees. A positive value will be added and will result in a clockwise rotation. A negative value will be subtracted and will result in a counter clockwise rotation.
      Parameters:
      rotation - the rotation as a double
